dmca.title: Siam Handicrafts Complains to Google (#1)
dmca.body:
Attn: User Support, dmca complaints.

Complaint from Siam Intercontinental Handicrafts to Google Inc.
November/ 12 / 2003

Sender Information 
 [private] 
Siam Intercontinental Handicrafts 
 [private]

Amphur Muang 
Chiang Mai 50300 
Thailand 
Ph  [private]
Fax [private]
Mobile  [private]
E-mail  [private]@SiamInterHandicrafts.com 
http://www.SiamInterHandicrafts.com

Recipient information:
 [private]
 [private]
Cape Coral, Florida 33914
US

 [private]@oriental-connection.com
 [private]

Domain Name: ORIENTAL-CONNECTION.COM

Sent via: Fax 
Re: Infringement of our copyright material.

From:  [private]
November/ 12 / 2003

To:
Google, Inc.

Re: Infringement of our copyright material.

To whom it may concern:

These are some of the images and text from my website which have been infringed

pages.

We have contacted the site contact several times and requested that they remove the offending images and text. The contact information is as follows:

 [private] 
 [private] 
Cape Coral, Florida 33914 
USA 
 [private]@orlental-connection.com 
ph  [private] 
Domain Name: ORIENTAL-CONNECTION.COM

Administrative & Technical Contact:
 [private]
 [private]
Cape Coral, Florida 33914
USA
 [private]@oriental-connection.com
 [private]

They have failed to do so.  Therefore, I am requesting that you delist all pages of the oriental-connection.com online store in the Google Search.

I have in my possession both the original photo prints which I took myself over the last 9 years and I have the original raw digital photos on floppy disc and CD which I also took myself with my own camera. I can produce these on request or in a court of law.
